intro-event.dialog-sequence.1: Ahoy there! Reckon you're wonderin' what's goin' on here?
intro-event.dialog-sequence.2: Come on over, have a gander!
intro-event.dialog-sequence.3: Well, I've sunk some hard-earned clams into this here machine to kick off my new fishin' trainin' business.
intro-event.dialog-sequence.4: With years of reelin' in the big ones, I figure I can share my know-how with anyone keen on givin' this a serious go.
intro-event.dialog-sequence.5: For a fair fee, of course, heh.
intro-event.dialog-sequence.6: *sniff* Aye, the ocean's got a mighty fine scent today... I reckon the fish'll be bitin' real good!
intro-event.dialog-sequence.7: If yer interested, just take a gander at the board behind me and snag yerself a ticket from that machine.
intro-event.dialog-sequence.8: I promise ya won't regret it, and you'll be haulin' in the catch of the day in no time!
intro-event.dialog-sequence.9: Alright, time to head out and restock on some fresh catch at the shop!
workshop-info-board.title: Willy's Fishing Workshops
workshop-info-board.description:
Alright, to kick off yer fishin' trainin', ya gotta grab yerself a ticket from the machine, then pick yer fish to practice with.

- Them tickets only work 'round this spot
- Don't dilly-dally, them tickets got an expiry date
- Feel free to swap out yer practice fish whenever ya please
- Remember, any fish ya reel in won't be stickin' 'round
- Yer baits and tackles won't be takin' a hit either
- And while ya won't be earnin' any experience points, yer sure to hone yer skills along the way


Now, best of luck out there, and most importantly, have a whale of a time!
ticket-machine.dialog.title: Workshop Ticket Machine
global-info.ticket-about-to-expire: Your Ticket is about to expire.
global-info.ticket-expired: Your Workshop Ticket has expired. Buy a new one.
